description: Notes from HAB OOS meeting, April 4 2018, SCCRWP.

components.data:
• WA OR?
  • Standardization of sampling/ processing
  • Data Analysis and Quality control
  • Nutrient access limited to HAB tab
  • Initiate a rubric for counts/ chlorophyll QC
  • Quantitative counts for key HAB genera vs relative abundance Index
  • Zeros, non-detects recorded as NaN?
  • Standardized taxonomic complexity
  • Standard format of HAB species
  • NOAA IOOS is not a research agency, do not expect funding to do research
  • Moving towards a more relational database
    • ERDDAP?
  • Optimal Data Display
  • One stop shop SCOOS HAB bulletin
    • Under development
    • Input required
  • Steve: Potential Data Clients: Desalination, aquaculture…
    • Governor’s Summit San Francisco 2018
    • HABs and Climate Change? Possible impetus to move HABMAP forward
  • Vicky: OBIS, ERDDAP, Darwin Core
  • Funding and leveraging
  • Frontiers paper on cell count/ observation best practices?
  • Animal sampling: disconnect between fishing community and regulatory agencies
  • Website issues: ownership, redundancy
    • IFRAME
  • Clarify SCOOS HAB bulletin with a descriptive document?
  • CenCOOS: get oxygen and pH online
  • Integrating HABs OOS with West Coast OA and hypoxia, multi-stressors, Gaps assessment
  • Google Doc within shore station monitors to generate list of stakeholders/ end users
  • Cohesive branding
  • Standard taxonomy reporting template
